Container.Name: hytale-server-manager
Container.Overview:
Hytale Server Manager is a web-based management dashboard for Hytale game servers. Features include real-time monitoring, mod management, player administration, backups, and automation.
Default port: 3001 (HTTPS) Default credentials: Check container logs on first run for admin password

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for the web interface and API (HTTPS)

Config.Name: Game Server Port (UDP)
Config.Description: Hytale game server port (UDP/QUIC - required for game connections)

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: Path for persistent data (database, logs, servers, backups)

Config.Name: JWT Secret
Config.Description: Secret key for JWT authentication. Leave empty to auto-generate (sessions will reset on container restart).

Config.Name: JWT Refresh Secret
Config.Description: Secret key for JWT refresh tokens. Leave empty to auto-generate.

Config.Name: Settings Encryption Key
Config.Description: 32-character encryption key for settings. Leave empty to auto-generate.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging level: debug, info, warn, error

Config.Name: Rate Limit Max
Config.Description: Maximum API requests per 15 minutes. Default: 10000

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (Unraid default: 99)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (Unraid default: 100)
